body_html:
When I open popup activity (e.g., PreferenceActivity), onPause is called and "Activity has leaked window that was originally added ..." error occurs.
This is because the code wrote as !isFinishing(), activity call finish() even though it is not actually finishing.
New activity works, but cannot go back to previous activity since it's already finished.

body:
When I open popup activity (e.g., PreferenceActivity), onPause is called and "Activity has leaked window that was originally added ..." error occurs.
This is because the code wrote as !isFinishing(), activity call finish() even though it is not actually finishing.
New activity works, but cannot go back to previous activity since it's already finished.
